characters: Driver of a blue sedan, driver of a white sedan
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a multi-lane road. A blue sedan is ahead, maintaining a consistent speed. A white sedan on the left side suddenly moves into the self-vehicles lane, causing a potential cut-in situation.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a consistent speed while observing the blue sedan ahead. The white sedan on the left side suddenly moves into the self-vehicles lane, causing the self-driving vehicle to decelerate to avoid a collision.
key_objects: 1) Front: A blue sedan, approximately 20 meters away, maintaining a consistent speed. 2) Left: A white sedan, approximately 5 meters away, moving into the self-vehicles lane, causing a potential cut-in situation.
